column7: Very nice food and friendly staff
column9: The food is great! Probably the best Japanese food I’ve ever tried in Sweden. And most importantly, the staff is really nice. I don’t speak Swedish but the menu is in Swedish so one of the waitresses explained to me in detail about the food...More

Not the best dish I had. I ordered the 'todays dish' which I think costs 95 SEK but the portion was small. The sushi is very expensive and a friend of mine had the 7 bites and I think he wasn't that satisfied as well.

Wasabi isn't the cosiest restaurant but they make up for it by serving surprisingly tasty food. Both the sushi and the main courses are good value for your money and there isnt much to complain about. The staff is friendly and helpful.

I have dined here on previous grips and always felt good about the feel of the dining room and the taste of the food.  This time was no different.  Being only a bit hungry at dinnertime, I ordered the middle sushi assortment.  It was well...More

Their lunch food is excellent and the soup bowl is a good start while you are waiting for your order. It is better to move deeper into the restaurant since the noise at the cash register from noisy people fetching their take-out is deafening.

Never had such a good and fresh Sashimi in Europe. Great atmosphere and superior service. 

Also the Miso soup made a difference. 

I will come back!

column7: Great sushi, sashimi and other Asian cuisine
column9: Little place with great food for take away.  Bought dinner for Grandpa, Mom & Dad and two grandkids which was enjoyed by all.

Was here with a group of 8 people. We shared the large sashimi and large sushi platters for starters. While the sashimi was good, albeit rather standard in the fish variety, the nigiri sushi disappointed. The rice was gritty and flavorless (fish was still good)....More
Good sushi and all than but the best thing with this restaurant is the Japanese whisky collection and the guy who really know all there is about them!
Food was very good would have given 5 star but the cod sushi was terrible. I think it wasnt even cod because of the chewyness of it. But all other was great.

Älskar sushi så jag tycker att detta är ett säkert kort varje gång. Beställer både hämtsushi & äter på plats....More

column7: Trevligt ställe med god vällagad mat

column7: Sehr gutes Sushi in schönem Restaurant
column9: Man kann im Wasabi Menüs bestellen und sich überraschen lassen, was auf den Teller kommt. Die Qualität war sehr gut...More
Eher kleineres Restaurant in Lund. Personal sehr freundlich, klassische Auswahl von Japanischem Essen. Qualität guter Durchschnitt.
